mapper.select: SELECT knowledge.id,content,title,type_id,kname FROM knowledge LEFT JOIN knowledge_type ON knowledge.type_id = knowledge_type.id WHERE knowledge.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge ( type_id, title, content, has_video, video_url ) VALUES (#{Knowledge.knowledgeType.id},#{Knowledge.title}, #{Knowledge.content},#{Knowledge.has_video},#{Knowledge.video_url});
